alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 13 at 4:04PM EDT until March 15 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 6 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting 45 to 50 mph through much of Wednesday morning. * WHERE...Northern New Haven, Northern Middlesex and Northern New London Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to 6 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Elevated locations will see locally 3 to 4 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London
